about_the_game:
• A Co-op Space Adventure!

Grab a few crew mates and man your battle stations as you fight through enemy infested space. Work together to keep your rust-bucket from falling apart as your pilot dodges missiles and asteroids. Anything could go wrong!

  • There are no Health Bars

When your ship takes a missile to the aft compartment, there is no health bar slider that gets a bit lower. Instead, the aft compartment starts leaking air, perhaps the oxygen generator was stored there? It is up to you and your crew to decide what needs fixing first. Can your crew afford to take someone off of the guns to seal up the holes? Or perhaps you have plenty of oxygen stored up and sealing off the compartment is smarter for now.

  • Wish list and Join our Discord for Frequent Updates!

short_description: Project Horizon is a 1-4 player co-op first-person spaceship simulator where the entire crew needs to work together to carefully maintain the nuclear reactor, take up arms against enemy ships, and repair every leak and faulty electrical panel to survive.
